dashboardSubtext: Manage your Family, Financial, and Insurance details in one place. Stay secure and in control!
errorBoth: Please provide either email or phone number, not both
errorRequired: Please provide either an email or phone number
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
faqDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about our product and solutions.
uttaradhikariDescription: Uttaradhikari is a digital platform where you can securely store important documents, bank accounts, loans, and insurance details, and nominate trusted individuals who will get access in case of any unfortunate event.
howSecureIsData: How secure is my data on Uttaradhikari?
dataSecurityDescription: We use industry-standard encryption and multi-layered security to ensure your personal and financial data is completely safe. Only you and your authorized nominees can access the information.
whoCanBeNominee: Who can be added as a nominee?
nomineeDescription: You can add family members, relatives, or any trusted individual as your nominee. You can also update or change nominees anytime from your account.
whatHappensToAccountHolder: What happens when something happens to the account holder?
accountHolderEventDescription: In case of an unfortunate event, the registered nominee can request access. After proper verification, the nominee will receive the documents and account details shared by the user.
canUpdateDocuments: Can I update or remove my documents anytime?
updateDocumentsDescription: Yes, you can add, update, or remove any document or account information at any time from your dashboard. Your data stays completely under your control.
doesCoverLoansAndInsurances: Does Uttaradhikari cover loans and insurances too?
loansAndInsurancesDescription: Yes, along with your bank accounts and documents, you can also add loan details, insurance policies, and investments to ensure your nominee gets access when needed.
isThereCost: Is there a cost for using Uttaradhikari?
costDescription: We offer both free and premium plans. The free plan allows basic storage and nominee setup, while premium plans provide more storage, advanced features, and priority support.
supportDescription: You can call or email our support team regarding any issue.
profilePictureDescription: Choose an image that best reflects your identity (JPG, JPEG, or PNG only. 1MB Max)
name: Name
changePasswordDescription: Update your password to ensure account security
deleteAccountDescription: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted.
errorFetchingProfile: An error occurred while fetching profile data
noChangesEmergencyContact: No changes detected in emergency contact
invalidFileType: Only JPG, JPEG, or PNG files are allowed
dataCollectionDescription: We collect user information, including personal, financial, and insurance details, to provide a seamless experience. This data is stored securely and used solely for the intended purpose.
useOfDataDescription: Your data is used to personalize your dashboard, enhance security, and improve service functionality. We do not sell or share your data with third parties without consent.
dataProtectionDescription: We employ encryption and other security measures to safeguard user information from unauthorized access.
thirdPartyServicesDescription: Smart Nominee may integrate with third-party services for added functionalities. Users are advised to review the privacy policies of these third parties before sharing information.
cookiesAndTrackingDescription: We use cookies and tracking technologies to enhance user experience and analyze platform performance. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
userRightsDescription: Users can request access, correction, or deletion of their data by contacting us. We strive to comply with data protection laws applicable in your region.
policyUpdatesDescription: Smart Nominee may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes.
introductionDescription: Welcome to Smart Nominee. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to abide by these Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.
userEligibilityDescription: You must be at least 18 years old to use Smart Nominee. By using our services, you confirm that you meet the eligibility criteria.
accountRegistrationDescription: To access certain features, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and ensuring the accuracy of your information.
useOfServicesDescription: Smart Nominee allows users to store and manage personal, financial, and insurance details securely. You agree to use our platform responsibly and not for any unlawful activities.
dataAccuracyDescription: Users are responsible for ensuring that the information entered into Smart Nominee is accurate and up-to-date.
securityAndComplianceDescription: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect user data. However, users are responsible for safeguarding their accounts against unauthorized access.
terminationOfServicesDescription: Smart Nominee reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms or misuse our services.
limitationOfLiabilityDescription: Smart Nominee is not liable for any direct or indirect losses resulting from inaccuracies, misuse, or unauthorized access to your account.
changesToTermsDescription: We may update these Terms & Conditions from time to time. Continued use of our services after modifications implies acceptance of the new terms.
lifeIsUnpredictable: Life is unpredictable, but your legacy shouldn't be. We created this platform to ensure that your personal, financial, and nominee details are always accessible, safeguarded, and shared with the people who matter most only when it is truly needed.
weDonNotJustStoreDataDescription: We Protect It Until It’s Needed.
yourPrivacyIsOurPriorityDescription: Hidden Transactions Stay Hidden Until You Decide Otherwise.
yourWealthYourDecisions: Your Wealth, Your Decisions, Your Control
takeChargeDescription: Take charge of your financial legacy today. Keep your information safe, and ensure it reaches the right hands at the right time.
secureYourFinancialFuture: Secure Your Financial Future with Confidence
everythingYouNeedToKnow: Everything you need to know about securing your legacy with confidence and clarity.
howSecureIsMyDataFaqDescription: Your data is encrypted with military-grade security and stored in a vault that only activates when conditions are met. We use end-to-end encryption and zero-knowledge architecture to ensure that only you and your designated nominees can access your information when the time is right.
whatHappensIfIDontRespond: What happens if I don't respond to alerts?
whatHappensIfIDontRespondDescription: After five unanswered emails or notifications, your pre-set plan triggers, securely passing your assets to your nominees. This automated system ensures nothing falls through the cracks, while giving you ample opportunity to respond if you're simply on vacation or temporarily unreachable.
canIChangeMyNomineesDescription: Yes, you can update your nominees anytime through your secure dashboard. We've made the process simple while maintaining strict security protocols to verify your identity before any changes are made to your succession plan.
isThereALimitToAssets: Is there a limit to the assets I can add?
isThereALimitToAssetsDescription: No limits—add as many financial, property, or personal assets as you need. Our flexible system accommodates everything from traditional assets like real estate and bank accounts to digital assets such as cryptocurrencies and online accounts.
ourTopKeyFeatures: Our Top Key Features That Empowers YOU
secureAssetDebtStorageDescription: Your financial footprint, safeguarded until the right moment. Store all your transactions, assets, debts—whether your family knows about them or not.
nomineeManagementDescription: Your loved ones should never be left in the dark. Assign nominees, define access levels, and control when they receive the information.
smartInactivityDetection: Smart Inactivity Detection & Triple Confirmation System
smartInactivityDetectionDescription: Because mistakes are not an option. Before we disclose any information to your nominees, we verify your inactivity at least 3 times through multiple communication channels. If there is no response, only then do we share the data.
hiddenOrDelayedAssetDisclosureDescriptio: Protect your family's future the way you want. Maybe you have investments you don't want your family to know about until the right time. Maybe you fear sudden wealth will make them lazy, careless, or unmotivated. You decide when and how your financial secrets are revealed.
unaccountedTransactionsDescription: Your secrets, protected and revealed on your terms. If you have transactions or assets that you want to disclose only after your passing, you can store them here securely. No immediate reporting. No interference. Only your chosen nominee will access it—when you allow it.
insightsReportsDescription: Your financial roadmap, always clear. Understand your total assets, liabilities, and nominee allocations with advanced analytics.
securingYourLegacy: Securing your legacy, ensuring their future. We help you safeguard what matters most and ensure it reaches the hands that will carry it forward.
subscribeForLegacyPlanning: Subscribe for legacy planning tips and be the first to know about our latest features.
protectedSharedWhenMatters: Protected & Shared Only When It Matters.
yourHardEarnedAssets: Your hard-earned assets, your hidden investments, and your responsibilities should never be lost or forgotten. Store them securely and ensure they reach your loved ones at the right time, in the right way.
howItWorksTheSafetyProcess: How It Works – The Safety Process
weveCreatedASecure: We've created a secure and transparent system to protect your information while ensuring it reaches the right people at the right time.
yourDataIsEncrypted: Your data is encrypted with military-grade security and stored in a vault that only activates when conditions are met.
storeAllYourAssets: Store all your assets, debts, transactions, and nominee details.
youControlWhenAndHow: You control when and how your family receives this information.
weAttemptContact: We attempt contact at least 3 times before confirming inactivity and notifying your nominee.
dataIsSharedOnlyWhenNecessary: Data is Shared Only When Necessary
ifWeConfirmSomething: If we confirm something has happened, only then do we securely disclose your stored information to your nominees.
flexiblePlans: Flexible plans to suit your needs. Choose what fits you best and get the security and control you deserve.
customTimeDelayForNomineeDisclosure: Custom Time Delay for Nominee Disclosure
industryLeadingSecurity: Industry-leading security, inactivity verification, data encryption, 24/7 monitoring, and 30-day money-back guarantee.
noCreditCardRequired: No credit card required for 14-day trial
aes256Encryption: AES-256 encryption ensures maximum protection of all your sensitive information.
noPrematureDisclosure: No premature disclosure of your data. We verify thoroughly before any information is shared.
youControlWhatsRevealed: You control what's revealed, when, and to whom. Your data remains under your authority at all times.
yourDataIsExclusivelyYours: Your data is exclusively yours. We never compromise on ownership or access.
zeroThirdPartySharing: Zero third-party sharing. Your information remains strictly confidential.
everyDataInteractionRequiresConsent: Every data interaction requires your explicit, informed consent.
fullVisibilityIntoDataUsage: Full visibility into how, when, and why your data might be used.
privacyIsntAFeature: Privacy isn't a feature we add—it's the core principle we never compromise.
afterMyFathersPassing: After my father’s passing, we had no idea about his investments. It took us months to figure things out. If this platform had existed back then, our financial stability wouldn’t have been affected.
iHaveAssetsThatI: I have assets that I don’t want my family to know about right now, but I also don’t want them to go to waste. This platform gives me the peace of mind to disclose them at the right time.
iNowHaveCompletePeace: I now have complete peace of mind knowing my family won’t struggle to find my important documents and financial details if anything happens to me.
weDoNotNotifyNomineesImmediately: We DO NOT Notify Nominees Immediately
beforeReleasingAnyInformation: Before releasing any information, we send notifications to your preferred communication channels (Email, SMS, Calls, In-App Alerts).
weCheckForInactivity: We check for inactivity at least 3 times across multiple days before any disclosure.
ifNoResponseIsReceived: If no response is received, we proceed with data transfer to your nominees—but ONLY according to your predefined settings.
youCanPauseUpdateOrCancel: You can pause, update, or cancel nominee disclosure settings at any time before inactivity is confirmed.
rigorous3StageVerification: Rigorous 3-stage verification process spanning multiple communication channels.
comprehensiveChecksToEnsure: Comprehensive checks to ensure your nominees' identities and intentions.
ongoingVerificationAndSecurity: Ongoing verification and security checks to maintain data integrity.
securityIsNotAProduct: Security is not a product, but a continuous process of verification and trust.
smartNomineeWasDesigned: Smart Nominee was designed with everyone in mind. No matter your situation, we have solutions to protect what matters most to you.
ensureYourLovedOnes: Ensure your loved ones don't suffer financially if something happens to you.
yourGrowingWealth: Your growing wealth and assets deserve to be tracked and secured for the future.
keepYourInvestments: Keep your investments and debts organized—whether disclosed or hidden.
manageYourRealEstate: Manage your real estate, rental properties, and undisclosed investments in one place.
safeguardAndControlAccess: Safeguard and control access to your confidential transactions.
leaveAWellOrganizedLegacy: Leave a well-organized legacy for your family. Because they should never have to struggle to find what matters.
weAreMoreThanATool: We’re more than a tool—we’re your partner in securing your legacy with unmatched care and control.
withAes256Encryption: With AES-256 encryption and triple verification, your sensitive data is protected like a bank vault—never shared without your consent.
hideTransactionsOrAssets: Hide transactions or assets until the right time. You decide what’s revealed, when, and to whom—even after you're gone.
pauseUpdateOrCancel: Pause, update, or cancel nominee settings anytime. Tailor your legacy plan to fit your life, no matter your situation.
weCheckInactivityMultiple: We check inactivity multiple times via email, SMS, calls, and alerts before any disclosure, ensuring accuracy and peace of mind.
fromFamiliesToRetirees: From families to retirees, investors to property owners—our platform serves all, safeguarding what matters most to you.
realStoriesProveIt: Real stories prove it: we help your loved ones avoid financial struggles, leaving a legacy that’s organized and secure.
footerDescription: Securing your legacy, ensuring their future. We help you safeguard what matters most and ensure it reaches the hands that will carry it forward.
subscribeDescription: Subscribe for legacy planning tips and be the first to know about our latest features.
